languages.text: {n}Когда шарик закатывается в красную лузу, зеваки одобрительно присвистывают, а флейтист звонко смеется:{/n} "Ловко, Ваша Светлость! Но я и не сомневался, что вы — достойный противник. Ваша тактика... пожалуй, я запомню ее я для своих будущих игр".

{n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. Your tactic... I think I will remember it for my future games."

Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

languages.text: {n}Lorsque la bille tombe dans le trou rouge, quelques sifflets impressionnés s'élèvent de la foule. Le joueur de flûte, quant à lui, se met à rire de bon cœur.{/n} « Bravo, Votre Seigneurie ! J'ai tout de suite su que vous seriez {mf|un|une} adversaire digne de ce nom. Quant à votre stratégie... Il va me falloir la garder à l'esprit pour les parties à venir. »
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque la bille tombe dans le trou rouge, quelques sifflets impressionnés s'élèvent de la foule. Le joueur de flûte, quant à lui, se met à rire de bon cœur.{/n} « Bravo, Votre Seigneurie ! J'ai tout de suite su que vous seriez {mf|un|une} adversaire digne de ce nom. Quant à votre stratégie... Il va me falloir la garder à l'esprit pour les parties à venir. »

languages.text: {n}Cuando la bola cae por el orificio rojo, algunos de los presentes silban impresionados, y el flautista ríe efusivamente.{/n} «¡Muy {mf|astuto, milord|astuta, milady}! En fin, no me cabía ninguna duda de que sería usted un rival digno. Y su estrategia... creo que la tendré presente en futuras partidas».
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando la bola cae por el orificio rojo, algunos de los presentes silban impresionados, y el flautista ríe efusivamente.{/n} «¡Muy {mf|astuto, milord|astuta, milady}! En fin, no me cabía ninguna duda de que sería usted un rival digno. Y su estrategia... creo que la tendré presente en futuras partidas».

languages.text: {n}ボールが赤い穴に落ちると、見物客から驚きの声が上がり、フルート吹きは大笑いする。{/n}「流石ですねぇ、陛下！いやはや、やはりあなた様は戦い甲斐のあるお方です。あなた様のその戦略は…今後のゲームのために覚えておきましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

traits.locale_text: {n}ボールが赤い穴に落ちると、見物客から驚きの声が上がり、フルート吹きは大笑いする。{/n}「流石ですねぇ、陛下！いやはや、やはりあなた様は戦い甲斐のあるお方です。あなた様のその戦略は…今後のゲームのために覚えておきましょう」

languages.text: {n}当球落入红色的洞里时，人群中响起了几声钦佩的口哨声。吹笛人开怀大笑起来。{/n}“您可真了不起，大人！我早就知道，您一定会是位强劲的对手。至于您采用的策略……我会在未来的游戏中牢牢记住。”
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

traits.locale_text: {n}当球落入红色的洞里时，人群中响起了几声钦佩的口哨声。吹笛人开怀大笑起来。{/n}“您可真了不起，大人！我早就知道，您一定会是位强劲的对手。至于您采用的策略……我会在未来的游戏中牢牢记住。”

languages.text: {n}Als die Kugel in das rote Loch fällt, sind einige erstaunte Pfiffe aus dem Publikum zu hören, und der Flötenspieler lacht herzhaft.{/n} Klug gemacht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Nun, ich hatte keinen Zweifel daran, dass Ihr {mf|einen würdigen Gegner|eine würdige Gegnerin} abgeben würdet. Und Eure Strategie ... werde ich mir für künftige Spiele wohl merken müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die Kugel in das rote Loch fällt, sind einige erstaunte Pfiffe aus dem Publikum zu hören, und der Flötenspieler lacht herzhaft.{/n} Klug gemacht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Nun, ich hatte keinen Zweifel daran, dass Ihr {mf|einen würdigen Gegner|eine würdige Gegnerin} abgeben würdet. Und Eure Strategie ... werde ich mir für künftige Spiele wohl merken müssen."

languages.text: {n}Topun kırmızı deliğe düşmesiyle birlikte kalabalıktan hayranlık dolu birkaç ıslık sesi yükseliyor. Flütçü, samimi bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Zekice bir hamleydi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Zaten saygın bir rakip olduğunuza dair hiç kuşkum yoktu. Stratejiniz ise... Sanırım ilerideki oyunlarımda bunu aklımda bulunduracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}When the ball drops into the red hole, a few impressed whistles come from the crowd, and the flute player laughs heartily.{/n} "Cleverly done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Well, I had no doubt that you would be a worthy opponent. And your strategy... I think I will keep it in mind for my future games."
